name: First Day On The Job - A Monster's Story
name_original: First Day On The Job - A Monster's Story
description:
First Day On The Job - A Monster's Story is a short Point And Click Adventure. You have to help a monster to scare a teenager by finding out what scares her. The game has multiple endings and is very short. So try out different things.

The game plays in only one scene. A description of the controls can be found in the game. The controls are mouse only. Languages available: English and German.

The game originally came to life during Ludum Dare 33 (Theme: You are the Monster). A few month later I decided to rework and polish the game to have a first small but finished game released. Feedback and bug reports are welcome. Twitter: @yellowhatgames, Email: soeren.poffertje[at]googlemail.com.

Game by: Sören Hoffstedt.

Music: "Look Behind You" by Jay Man www.ourmusicbox.com

Sound Effects: http://www.freesfx.co.uk and www.kenney.nl
